item.title: About
item.description: I am a Linux engineer by day and a coder by night. I am an ambitious problem solver with a passion for Linux (Slackware, Redhat, Ubuntu, Centos)/Unix (Solaris, AIX, OSX), development, coding and technology as a whole. I am continually evaluating and upgrading my skills so that I can stay at the cutting edge of IT by studying and taking online courses. I started to create this blog to share my passion with technology.
